name: A Game of Monocles
description:
A Game Of Monocles is a short, 2D, puzzle game. You have been unfortunate enough to find yourself locked in an old mansion. Explore rooms, avoid traps, find monocles, and keys to escape! Which door will you choose? 

This game was made by Green Lizard Gaming, and tested by Bomb_lobber_500. 

If you find bugs or have any suggestions please leave a comment! We appreciate any feedback! :)
